snippet.title: Steam Chain - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Pretty good hen? Although some art stuff still needs minor tweaks, Steam Chain is coming together rather nicely if I do say so myself. That said, this is only the first area, which is to say, everything else is a complete mess and cannot be shown under any circumstances, at least that's what some people say. 

Anyway, nothing to see here, moving along.

 "Link Clicking" is allowed and you should definitely do it.

Music by Filipe Simões https://soundcloud.com/farsycho

Steam Chain is a steampunk platformer with a focus on world-building and satisfying moment to moment gameplay, supported by a fluent movement system and puzzles organically integrated with it. Stay tuned for more updates!

Clickable links, unlike those pesky un-clickable variants:
https://twitter.com/WildLynxDev
https://www.instagram.com/wildlynxstudios.dev/?hl=en
https://www.indiedb.com/members/wildlynxstudios
